title: the wa handkerchief
text:
October 30, 2012Shopping	

				
			Leave a comment		
	
			

	
		
			The “Wa” Handkerchief
		
		What’s the coolest pocket square you’ve ever seen?
I’m telling you it’s this one.                         
After doing the bow tie a bow tie with no hands post recently I started going through the stuff that The Hill-side & Co has been up to. Apart from having some amazing mens accessories, they also have maybe the coolest pocket square I have ever seen in my life! There is nothing I love more than a piece of fashion with a story. Watch this clip, and get ready for serious pocket square envy.

That’s pretty awesome uh?
They have some other fun vids on there vimeo channel, worth checking out.
Okay. Stay fancy.
